## PBShaderExp.setAt() method

Set element in the array by index

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAt(index: number | PBShaderExp, val: number | boolean | PBShaderExp): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | index of the element |
